name: BlockVerse
description: Free to play, play to earn, earn to live, live to play! Earn "$USDT" or "$BLOCK" Seamlessly bridging blockchain technology across Web-2 and Web-3 enabled systems within play-to-earn (P2E) gaming, art, collectibles and entertainment industries. Block Usecases - : Subscriptions : Own a subscription to showcase your artwork. Viewers and collectors have to pay a fixed crypto fee in $BLOCK to get access to your artwork in the metaverse. Gaming : Whether its Battle Royale, Arcade or simple PVP games, $BLOCK is your in-game currency as well as your P2E reward. MetaVerse : $BLOCK gives you access to our artifacts in gaming platforms like Oculus, Minecraft and Roblox. NFT's : $BLOCK allows you to purchase/use game agnostic utility NFT's in the game of your choice in the OmniaVerse ecosystem.
